result.execSummary:
The defendant Harrison Jo Pederson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Harrison Jo Pederson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Harrison Jo Pederson was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

DNA surcharge.
Once final payment is received Court will dismiss Count 2.

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Christopher R. Bub   DF:  Harrison Jo Pederson appeared. Case called at 11:05 am. There is an agreement. ADA Mckinley recites agreement. Court reviews constitutional rights with Def. Court finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for count one, Def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates Def guilty of count 1. Once final payment is received court will dismiss count #2. Court orders:
Fine: $250.00
DNA Surcharge: $200
Apply Bond on file
Defendant's to Suppress Statements filed by Atty Christopher Bub. eif
Defendant's to Suppress Evidence filed by Atty Christopher Bub. eif
filed by Atty Christopher Bub. eif
Filed by PD's Office. Re: paperwork on case. km
Status conference on April 27, 2015 at 11:00 am.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Jennifer Anne Bork, DF ATTY: John A. Kucinski, DF: Harrison Jo Pederson appeared.  Court called at 11:36 a.m. Includes case 14CM378 (plea/sentencing) & 15CM91 (STC).   In case 14CM378 DE pleads No Contest to Ct 2.  Court finds the DE adjudicated Guilty of Ct. 2.  On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 1. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:  DE to pay $600 for restitution.  Court orders F/F or $250.00.  Apply money on file.  DE has 20 days to appeal.  15CM91 to be scheduled for a future hearing in Branch 2.  Court adjourned.  lw
